name: Santa's Cookie Cascade (2015)
description:
This an extremely old project I made back in 2015, just now re-released to itch.io

There is no changes in this version.

It's Christmas time! That means Santa is on his nicest behavour (or naughtiest?) It's time for him to eat all the cookies he can, just like every other year. But, what's this? Yes, those pesky Yetis are at it again, stopping Santa from all those cookies! Well, Santa is sick and tired of this. It's time to end the Yetis once and for all.

Help Santa eat cookies and destroy Yetis with no hesitation!

This is my Christmas gift to everyone! Happy Holidays!
